instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A2337: What is A2337? A2337 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Air from years Late 2020 M1 with EMC 3598, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-02016..

threads.title: Macbook <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2337</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> A and D
threads.message:
Only A and D working on the keyboard.
Customer had their motherboard replaced from Apple. They had also quoted for the topcase for keyboard issue but the customer declined.

Tried a Known good keyboard.
Installed the board on a known good chasis. 
Still the same. Only A and D work. Nothing else

Weird Issue.

threads.title: Macbook <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2337</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> A and D
threads.message:
Really weird.
No reaction at all on any other key?

KB information goes to M1 through the same SPI bus as TP.
Check all IPD related components from page 77.

threads.title: Macbook <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2337</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> A and D
threads.message:
Everything looks okay to me.
Installed this board on yet another chasis. and in this one it works properly.

I am so confused.
Even used this working trackapd and flex on other chasis and keyboards but the same.
